document.masterDocTitle: Australian Unionicola (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Unionicolidae), with the description of two new subgenera and eight new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Australian Unionicola (Acari: Hydrachnidia: Unionicolidae), with the description of two new subgenera and eight new species

Remarks .
Unionicola crassipalpis
is a widespread species, known from New Caledonia , New Guinea and Sulawesi. Within Australia , the species has been reported from Queensland, New South Wales and the Northern Territory (
Viets 1981
,
Harvey 1998
), and is reported here for the first time from Western Australia .
